projects.title: Full-Stack Chat Application
projects.bodyText: Build a Full-Stack Chat application that allow users to create accounts, log in, and chat with other users in real-time.

projects.title: Build a Simple Payroll Management System on My local Machine
projects.bodyText: Built a Payroll Management System using front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Addionally, I used a database (MySQL and PHP) to store and retrieve employee information. The system allows users to add, edit, and delete employee records, as well as generate payroll reports.

projects.title: Personal Financial Management System
projects.bodyText: This is a simple program that helps users manage their personal finances. It uses Python's Tkinter for the user interface, SQLite for storing data, and pandas for handling reports.

projects.title: Paradise Nursery shopping application
projects.bodyText: The application interface will allow you to browse a variety of houseplants and add them to a shopping cart. The shopping cart feature lets you see all your items and their total cost.

projects.title: Khmer New Year In Cambodia
projects.bodyText: Develop a simple Khmer New Year website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and Jquery
